---
title: Lit Review Table
author: Kamryn Mansfield
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

Read in the csv of the lit review table:

```{r}
lit_tbl <- read_csv("lit_review_table.csv") |>
  select(Title, Citation = `bibtex name`, Dataset, Findings = `Main Findings`)
```

Output the table:

```{r}
#| label: tbl-lit-summary
#| tbl-cap: "Summary of the Literature"
#| tbl-alt: "A table listing and describing the literature used in this review"

kable(lit_tbl)

```
